holidays.title: Artist as Outlaw Day
holidays.description: Get your paints and spray cans ready as we gear up to celebrate outlaw artists!

holidays.title: Brew a Potion Day
holidays.description: Get your cauldrons out and brew with us as we celebrate Brew a Potion Day!

holidays.title: Day of Sanctity and Protection of Human Life
holidays.description: Today reflects on how precious life is — no matter how short it is.

holidays.title: Good Memory Day
holidays.description: What better way to celebrate Good Memory Day than to actually make good memories?

holidays.title: Gun Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Get ready to discuss gun safety and other ways to appreciate guns.

holidays.title: Robert E. Lee Day
holidays.description: Here’s everything you need to know about this state holiday and how to celebrate it.

holidays.title: Tenderness Toward Existence Day
holidays.description: Open up your hearts and minds; get ready to celebrate and appreciate life.

holidays.title: Tin Can Day
holidays.description: Crack open your favorite canned food as we celebrate the most functional food preservation tool!

holidays.title: World Quark Day
holidays.description: Get your spoons out to scoop up everything we’ve got for World Quark Day.

holidays.title: World Religion Day
holidays.description: Our differences make us stronger, so join us in celebrating our different beliefs and cultures.

holidays.title: World Snow Day
holidays.description: ‘Enjoy, experience and explore’ —  the motto of World Snow Day, which we’re taking seriously indeed.

holidays.title: Dolly Parton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This altruistic social butterfly and businesswoman who sings, acts, and writes songs is our star.

holidays.title: Edgar Allan Poe’s Birthday
holidays.description: Cheers to the man who pioneered what we refer to as the ambiguous horror story.

holidays.title: Janis Joplin’s Birthday
holidays.description: She was the world’s first true female rock star, the “queen of rock ‘n’ roll.”

holidays.title: Lil Scrappy’s Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrating a well-respected rapper and a household name in the Southern hip-hop arena.

holidays.title: Mac Miller’s Birthday
holidays.description: He was one of the leaders of the “new school” of young and talented rappers.

holidays.title: Paula Deen’s Birthday
holidays.description: The “queen of Southern cooking” always works her magic in the kitchen.
